name: PALer Trip
description:
This is my FMP project for my final year at University as part of my game design course.

Paler Trip is a game designed solely by me to be a demo of a traditional side-scroller platform game. The player is meant to learn the controls through the gameplay, and to complete the two levels available. 

Controls:

A/D to move horizontally

W/S to rotate the character

Spacebar to jump

Button to fire

Beta Testing:

The version available has a few assets removed for the time being as they are being refitted. What's missing are animations, moving platforms, and the background for the theme park level.

In this beta you are able to open any level you desire from the main menu.

If you are testing the game, could you please be sure to download and fill out the beta test document and be sure to send me it to ensure future improvements to my game demo.
